# Cookbook {#cookbook}


This chapter presents a number of recipes for some well known named experimental designs. The ingredients for each recipe are described in basic terminology (see Section \@ref(terminology)).

## Completely randomised design 

The basic ingredients of a completely randomised design, commonly abbreviated as CRD, are:

* two factors: experimental units and treatments 
* completely unstructured experiment
* there is no requirement of units being balanced.
